Package br.octahedron.cotopaxi.eventbus

Interface Summary
Event An Event to be delivered by the EventBus.
EventPublisher Publishes events to subscribers.
Subscriber Subscribers receive notifications each time an Event of this Subscriber interest is published.
 

Class Summary
AbstractNamespaceSubscriber A subscriber that deals with different namespaces, when receiving NamespaceEvents.
AppEngineEventPublisher An EventPublisher implementation using Google App Engine Tasks Queues Service.
AppEngineEventPublisher.PublishTask A simple DeferredTask that publishes an event to a Subscriber
EventBus This entity is responsible by manage subscriptions to Event and by publish Event.
NamespaceEvent Namespace events are events that refers to a given namespace.
 

Annotation Types Summary
InterestedEvent
